title: How can i turn the client back to the old ?
body: I installed the alpha client but i want the beta because the alpha is lagging on me . How can i turn the beta client back ? Please someone tell me .

replies.body:
I think you may want to revert back to the Legacy (old) client rather than the Beta. To do this, you can simply hit the Legacy Button at the login screen for the Beta client, as shown below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped. ^.^
